None.Name: Lava Sea
None.Description: If Volcano deals at least 1740 it starts erupting burning liquids. The lava flows from Volcano and slowly covers a 25m area around it dealing 100 damage to every enemy within it, up to 1000 in total. Affected enemies will be set on fire and take an additional 100 damage per second while burning. After 15 seconds the lava will retract again.

None.Name: Gifted Eruption
None.Description: Every 4 seconds, Volcano erupts burning boulders that crash onto the ground dealing 581 damage to enemies in a 15m radius up to 872 in total. Knocks back small and medium units. If Volcano deals at least 1740 damage it will start to regenerate 150 life points every second for 5 seconds.
